content: this pretty gingham hot pad or potholder will be such a fun addition to your fall decor make one or make a set keep them for your own kitchen or gift them to a friend i also have matching designs for a kitchen towel a dishcloth and a placemat they will all be available soon on my website as free ad-supported patterns if you want them all now in an ad-free format the pdf includes all 4 patterns you will find the free ad-supported version of the hot pad pattern here https //bananamoonstudio com/crochet-checkered-pot-holder-pattern/ these notes contain affiliate links if you click one and then make a purchase i will earn a small commission at no additional cost to you see my disclosure 1 for details difficulty level intermediate finished measurements 8 x 8 1/2 inches yarn we crochet dishie 2 100% cotton 190 yds 100 g yarn weight category 4/worsted/medium #25403 clementine #25409 swan and #28245 clementine twist note that swan and clementine are available in cones 3 760 yds 400 g this may be a good choice if you plan to make several items as the cones are a little cheaper than the same amount of yarn in skeins yardage 37 yds swan 72 yds clementine twist 44 yds clementine crochet hook j 6 mm 4 or size needed to match gauge notions tapestry needle 5 gauge 14 sts x 16 row = 4 inches in gingham stitch pattern to check gauge use the gingham stitch pattern to make a swatch with 2 columns of 2 squares each after blocking this should measure about 4 inches square get a free digital gift when you subscribe to my newsletter https //bananamoonstudio
